text: Llan imdanen d yiwen n lois. Iuzen ed Oebbi lambiyya ad beccoen, ad nabin. Issers ed, yidsen, Tazmamt s tidep, iwakken ad Ieudd ger medden, $ef wayen i$ef mgarraden. I imgarraden fellas, siwa wid iwumi teppunefk, mbaad ma iusa ten id ubeggen. Ppemyasamen. Inha Oebbi wid iumnen deg wayen n tidep, i$ef mgarraden, s tsrie iS. Oebbi Inehhu win i S ihwan, s abrid uwqim
